'''''The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack''''' is an album comprising of the soundtrack from ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]''. It was released digitally and on CD on [[9 December]] [[2014]].

==Contents==
===Disc 1===
# [[Fire and Water (soundtrack)|Fire and Water]]
# [[Shores of the Long Lake]]
# [[Beyond Sorrow and Grief]]
# [[Guardians of the Three]]
# [[The Ruins of Dale]]
# [[The Gathering of the Clouds (soundtrack)|The Gathering of the Clouds]]
# [[Mithril (soundtrack)|Mithril]]
# [[Bred for War]]
# [[A Thief in the Night (soundtrack)|A Thief in the Night]]
# [[The Clouds Burst (soundtrack)|The Clouds Burst]]
# [[Battle for the Mountain]]

===Disc 2===
# [[The Darkest Hour]]
# [[Sons of Durin]]
# [[The Fallen]]
# [[Ravenhill (soundtrack)|Ravenhill]]
# [[To the Death]]
# [[Courage and Wisdom]]
# [[The Return Journey (soundtrack)|The Return Journey]]
# [[There and Back Again (soundtrack)|There and Back Again]]
# [[The Last Goodbye]] - performed by [[Billy Boyd]]
# [[Ironfoot (soundtrack)|Ironfoot]]
